/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++ -g -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/simple_client.dir/simplest_client.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simple_client.dir/DataStruct.cpp.o -o simple_client   -L/root/rdma-core-49.0/build/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/root/rdma-core-49.0/build/lib -lrdmacm -libverbs librdmacm_tools.a -lpthread
